channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WA

item.title: Report E-2023100219
item.description:
Report E-2023100219

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-11T15:10:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-12
  • City: PASCO
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that one case of camp fuel (un1268) had been damaged by other freight and had released 1 gallon of product from one of the metal inner one gallon cans. The warehouse crew was able to contain and cleanup the release, so no contractors were dispatched.

item.title: Report X-2023090642
item.description:
Report X-2023090642

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-11T15:10:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-11
  • City: REDMOND
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Wet box brought to QA. DescribePack: Found that cap on plastic bottle of Sink & Surface Cleaner Sanitizer was loose and some of the liquid spilled out into the box. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Closed the lid tightly.

item.title: Report X-2023090526
item.description:
Report X-2023090526

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-05T15:12:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-06
  • City: TACOMA
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: As the package was being unloaded the package handler noticed the bottom of the box being wet. DescribePack: Loose caps. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Once the package was discovered the package was placed inside a hazmat tote, taken to the damaged hazmat cage, and set under the vent.

item.title: Report X-2023090525
item.description:

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-06
  • City: TACOMA

  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: As the package was being unloaded, the package handler noticed the side of the box being wet. DescribePack: Loose cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Once the package was discovered the package was set inside a hazmat tote, taken to the damaged hazmat cage, and set under the vent.
